levels.description:
Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>increases</>, Attack Range <@ba.vup>increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, normal attacks deal <@ba.vup>Arts damage</> and <$ba.sluggish>Slow</> the targets for <@ba.vup>{attack@sluggish:0.0}</> seconds
<@ba.rem>This unit is <$ba.stun>Stunned</> for {stun} seconds after the skill duration</>
